name: Birds Assault: Endless Clash
description:
The game has only one stage for the time being. More stages will be coming soon!

Enjoy smooth 2D platformer like experience. Survive and Clash birds as much as you can. Clash birds to add up your point.

The rules are simple. 

3 Type of Birds. 3 Rules.

i) Water Birds weak against Grass Birds.

ii) Fire Birds Weak against Water Birds.

iii) Grass Birds Weak  against Fire Birds

Things to be done. Clash with this basic.

Things to be avoided

Enjoy!!!
